SELECT student.sid, student.sname ,student.sex ,student.sclass,score.scorecname,score.scoreu ,score.scoret,score.scoregrade
FROM student ,score WHERE student.sid=score.scoreid

SELECT student.sid, student.sname ,student.sex ,student.sclass,score.scorecname,score.scoreu ,score.scoret,score.scoregrade
FROM student ,score
sid like '%' #{sid} '%'
and sname like '%' #{sname} '%'
and 1=1
and student.sid=score.scoreid
SELECT class.classid ,student.sclass ,score.scoreu,score.scoret,score.scoregrade FROM student ,class ,score WHERE student.sid=score.scoreid AND class.classclass=student.sclass and sclass=#{ccn}

select student.sid,student.sname,student.sex,student.school,student.sclass,student.phone ,score.scorecname,score.scoreu,score.scoret,scoregrade from student,score
scorecname like '%' #{scorecname} '%'
and 1=1
and student.sid=score.scoreid
